articles.title: Generative AI most desired new subscription service among 20s, 30s: poll
articles.author: Chang Dong-woo
articles.summary: A survey by Macromill Embrain reveals that generative AI is the most desired new subscription service among consumers in their 20s and 30s in South Korea. Health and home appliances and household chore services are also highly desired subscription offerings. This information is relevant to companies considering launching new subscription-based services.

articles.title: You Can Buy a Car Online, but It Still Involves Some Red Tape
articles.author: Matt Crisara
articles.summary: Amazon recently launched Amazon Autos, a new platform that allows users to buy Hyundai vehicles online. This service aims to simplify the car buying experience, providing an alternative to traditional dealerships, but still requires finalization at a dealership due to dealership licensure requirements.

articles.title: Wasabi to beat odour? 15 fancy deodorants that are skin-friendly (and look great on the vanity shelf)
articles.author: Tan Wei Lin
articles.summary: Several companies have launched new deodorant products with innovative formulations and features. Salt & Stone offers a Bergamot & Hinoki Natural Deodorant Gel, while Le Labo presents a lightweight roll-on deodorant with plant-derived ingredients. Glossier introduces a refillable deodorant with various scents, and Patricks launches ND1 High-Performance Zero-Aluminium Deodorant.

articles.title: This Dancing Robot Can Boogie Its Way Through a Human Attack
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Unitree Robotics released an update for its G1 robot, enhancing its balance and focus, which was demonstrated in a video where the robot maintained its dance moves despite interruptions. The G1, priced at $16,000, can also perform tasks like smashing walnuts and soldering, showcasing its diverse capabilities.

articles.title: 59 Products That Might Seem Too Good To Be True But Actually Aren't
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: The article showcases a variety of recently released or updated products across diverse categories, based on user reviews, including household goods like The Pink Stuff cleaner and Bottle Bright tablets, beauty products such as CeraVe Retinol Serum and TruSkin vitamin C serum, and personal care items like the Brumate Era water bottle and O'Keeffe's Lip Repair. Several products focus on convenience and efficiency, like the Fasta Pasta cooker for microwave pasta and the Clorox toilet wand for easy cleaning.

articles.title: New Greek Restaurant Will Open In Newark This Week: Gyro Project
articles.author: Eric Kiefer
articles.summary: The Gyro Project, part of ST Management Group, is opening a new restaurant at The Junction at Gateway in Newark on February 19th. The restaurant offers a modern, street food style menu featuring gyro platters, souvlaki, and Greek-style lamb chops, catering to office and fast-casual takeout customers. This is The Gyro Project's second location, following its successful debut in Fort Lee in 2023.

articles.title: Asian Development Bank plans 50% jump in annual financing to $36 billion by 2034
articles.author: ET Bureau
articles.summary: Elearnmarkets is offering a new financial education program. Inara Marketers is launching a performance marketing program for eCommerce brands. Accenture is launching a new AI and Analytics based Business Strategy program. Vskills has introduced a new Certified Jenkins Professional program. Storywallahs introduced Business Storytelling Masterclass. UC Berkeley Haas School of Business introduced Future of Marketing & Branding Masterclass. Several courses and programs related to AI, Finance, Marketing, and Web Development, are introduced by various providers.

articles.title: Micron Redefines Performance for AI PCs, Gamers and Professionals  Feb. 18, 2025 22:01
articles.summary: Micron has launched the 4600 PCIe Gen5 NVMe SSD, a client storage drive designed for gamers, creators, and professionals. The new SSD leverages Micron's G9 TLC NAND to achieve high sequential read and write speeds, enhanced energy efficiency, and reduced AI model loading times compared to previous generations. It is compatible with leading-edge platforms such as AMD's Ryzen 9000 Series processors and Intel Core Ultra Desktop and Mobile (Series 2) processors, and is now available for OEM sampling globally.

articles.title: Huawei's Accordion-Inspired Trifold Phone Is Now Available Globally
articles.author: Samantha Kelly
articles.summary: Huawei's Mate XT Ultimate Design, the world's first trifoldable phone, is now available for purchase outside of China, initially launching in Malaysia, Indonesia, the Philippines, UAE, Saudi Arabia and Mexico. Despite other manufacturers creating concept devices, Huawei remains the only company actually selling a trifoldable phone.

articles.title: Coca-Cola's Response to the Trendy New Sodas: Poppi and Olipop
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Coca-Cola is launching Simply Pop, a prebiotic soda flavored with fruit juice and vitamins, to compete in the 'better for you' soda category. Simply Pop will be available in five flavors and sold on Amazon and in national grocery stores for $2.49 per 12-ounce can.

articles.title: GitHub - jsventures/instldraw: Team-oriented tldraw built w/ InstantDB
articles.summary: Instant has launched instldraw, a collaborative version of tldraw, powered by InstantDB. This new product offers real-time team collaboration features on an infinite canvas. Getting started involves creating an Instant account, obtaining an app ID, and running the provided Next.js project.

articles.title: Best Phone Deals: Save Hundreds on Apple, Samsung and Other Phones With Trade-In or Carrier Offers
articles.author: Jared Di Pane
articles.summary: The article highlights upcoming releases and deals on various smartphones. The Samsung Galaxy S25 lineup is set to launch on Feb. 7, with pre-order bonuses available. Carriers like T-Mobile, AT&T and Verizon offer deals, including trade-in and new-line discounts, on phones like the iPhone 16, Galaxy S25, Pixel 9.

articles.title: Apple faces a new threat as Huawei takes its trifold phone to the world
articles.author: Kevin Williams
articles.summary: Huawei is launching its Mate XT Ultimate trifold phone internationally, expanding its availability to Malaysia, Indonesia, the Philippines, UAE, Saudi Arabia, and Mexico. The phone features a 10.2-inch screen, a 12MP ultrawide camera, and a 12MP periscope telephoto lens and is priced over $3,660.

articles.title: Surf Thru Express Car Wash holds grand opening for Sanger location
articles.summary: Surf Thru Express Car Wash opened its 37th location in Sanger, California. The new car wash is located at Jensen and Bethel Avenues. To celebrate the grand opening, customers can receive free car washes until February 23.

articles.title: Versed's New Makeup Line Has Me In A Chokehold
articles.author: Rachel Lapidos
articles.summary: Versed has launched its new makeup collection online and at Target on Feb. 18, featuring 15 makeup products. The collection includes items like the Skin Tint, Lipstick, Brow Gel, Concealer, and Blush, all priced under $19.99 and designed for easy use with nourishing formulas.

articles.title: Ayesha Curry Says ‚ÄòBusiness Talk' Is Like ‚ÄòForeplay' for Her and Steph Curry (Exclusive)
articles.author: Natasha Dye
articles.summary: Ayesha Curry has launched Sweet July's skincare line, inspired by her Jamaican roots, particularly Blue Mountain Coffee. The products aim to bring the efficacy of Jamaican ingredients to skincare. Steph Curry supports the launch and even tests the products.

articles.title: Product Of The Week: TPH Anything Glows Body Oil
articles.author: Celeste Polanco
articles.summary: Taraji P Henson's Body by TPH launched the "Anything Goes Body Oil," a moisturizing body oil designed for the winter season. The oil contains ingredients like squalene, avocado, and rosehip oil for hydration and vanilla for warmth. Its large size and non-greasy formula make it suitable for daily use without transferring to clothes, providing a radiant glow.

articles.title: Mizoram chief Minister Inaugurates Skywalk in Aizawl
articles.author: Bikash Singh
articles.summary: Mizoram Chief Minister inaugurated the Aizawl Peak Resort Skywalk, a new attraction constructed by Nail India Adventure Private Limited. The Skywalk features toughened glass panels and has undergone safety testing by NIT Mizoram, ensuring its structural integrity and safety for visitors. The resort is managed by the family of Er. H. Ginzalal, who has contributed to tourism development in Mizoram.

articles.title: Lisa Eldridge's concealer helped me achieve a ‚Äòflawless complexion'
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: A new concealer product offers precise application, moving away from traditional liquid formats.

articles.title: This New 3-in-1 Travel System Has Some Seriously Smart Features For Parents & Baby
articles.summary: Evenflo has launched the Shyft Intuiti+ Travel System, which includes the Revolve180 LiteMax NXT car seat with SensorySoothe technology, a sound and light system integrated into the car seat handle to soothe babies. The car seat features a 180-degree rotation for easy strapping, and the stroller includes all-wheel suspension and an extra-large storage basket. Evenflo is offering promotions on the travel system until March 31.

articles.title: Lufthansa partners with Infosys for a GCC in Bengaluru
articles.author: DHNS
articles.summary: Lufthansa's IT provider, Lufthansa Systems GmbH, will receive increased support for software and product development, specifically targeting products for external airline market customers. This suggests a focus on new or updated offerings in the airline market.

articles.title: Masterstroke by Zomato as Deepinder Goyal launches first AI product ‚ÄòNugget,' users can now..., food delivery to...
articles.summary: Zomato has launched Nugget, an AI-powered, no-code customer support platform for businesses, developed internally over three years. Nugget offers features like automated quality audits and voice AI agents, aiming to resolve up to 80% of queries autonomously and is currently used by Zomato, Blinkit, and Hyperpure.

articles.title: Drum roll, please: Here are the 18 most anticipated products we discovered this month
articles.summary: Several companies are launching new products in February 2025. These include a new Ninja ice cream maker and a powerful handheld Dyson vacuum. The products were selected based on their potential market impact and utility in daily life.

articles.title: Bayut Egypt Launches New Campaign, Revolutionizing the Prop-Tech Industry
articles.summary: Bayut Egypt has launched a new marketing campaign aimed at transforming Egypt's real estate sector. Leveraging 15 years of MENA region expertise, Bayut intends to deliver a seamless, technology-driven property search experience.

articles.title: Huawei's Accordion-Inspired Tri-Fold Smartphone Launches Globally
articles.author: Samantha Kelly
articles.summary: Huawei is expanding the availability of its Mate XT Ultimate Design, the world's first tri-folding phone, to markets including Malaysia, Indonesia, the Philippines, UAE, Saudi Arabia, and Mexico. Alongside the phone's expansion, Huawei has also unveiled the MatePad Pro 13.2-inch tablet, FreeArc open-ear earbuds, and the Band 10 smartwatch with an enhanced Emotional Wellbeing Assistant.

articles.title: Huawei's Accordion-Inspired Trifold Phone Is Now Available Globally
articles.author: Samantha Kelly
articles.summary: Huawei's Mate XT Ultimate Design, the world's first trifoldable phone, is now available in Malaysia, Indonesia, the Philippines, UAE, Saudi Arabia and Mexico. Huawei also unveiled the MatePad Pro 13.2-inch tablet, FreeArc open-ear earbuds, and the Band 10 smartwatch with an enhanced Emotional Wellbeing Assistant.

articles.title: Can dumbphones revive Europe's mobile industry?
articles.author: Thomas Macaulay
articles.summary: HMD Global, in partnership with Mattel, launched the Barbie Phone, a dumbphone with basic apps and Malibu Snake. The phone is marketed as a tool for digital detox and includes digital wellbeing tips and Barbie Meditation.

articles.title: People Are Paying Thousands for These ‚ÄòInteractive' AI Sex Dolls
articles.author: Kyle Phillippi
articles.summary: WMDoll is launching next-generation sex dolls that incorporate large language models, enabling them to hold conversations and remember past interactions. These AI-enhanced dolls will be priced between $1,600 and $2,200. WMDoll also plans to create an open-source environment for third-party developers to enhance the product further.

articles.title: Standard Motor Products, Inc. Launches New Corporate Website
articles.author: Standard Motor Products
articles.summary: Standard Motor Products, Inc. has launched its redesigned corporate website, SMPcorp.com. Developed in partnership with Scandia, the website is optimized for speed and compatibility across various devices. It also features an accessibility tool for users to customize their experience.

articles.title: Jazwares Signs Global Licensing Agreement With Yo Gabba Gabba! to Launch New Toys and Targeted Consumer Products
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Jazwares has announced a multi-year global licensing agreement to release toys, costumes, and accessories based on 'Yo Gabba Gabba!', including figures, toy vehicles, dolls, plush, playsets, musical instruments, and Squishmallows. The Jazwares' Yo Gabba Gabba! product line is expected to debut at retail in 2025.

articles.title: Someone squeezed an iPhone SE 3 into a Nokia Lumia 1020, and it looks amazing
articles.author: Lawrence Bonk
articles.summary: An individual has successfully integrated the internal components of an Apple iPhone SE 3 into a Nokia Lumia 1020 case, creating a functional smartphone referred to as 'NokiApple LumiPhone 1020 SE.' This device supports 5G, receives OTA updates, and utilizes the iPhone SE 3's A15 Bionic chip, enabling it to run modern apps, though Apple Pay and wireless charging do not function.

articles.title: 6 Ways AI Agents Can Help You Accomplish Hours Of Work In Minutes
articles.author: Aytekin Tank
articles.summary: Jotform is integrating AI agents into its workflows to automate tasks. Anthropic's Claude assists in creating websites and documents. Salesforce has launched Agentforce to enhance sales and marketing operations, while Lutra AI addresses data-related tasks. Additionally, Grain, HARPA AI and Botpress are mentioned as providing AI solutions for Sales meetings, Research and Customer service respectively.

articles.title: Chinese Company Sees Surge In Sex Doll Sales After Integrating AI
articles.author: Buzz Staff
articles.summary: WMDoll, a major adult toy maker in China, has launched its AI-powered MetaBox series sex dolls, featuring enhanced interactivity and responsiveness. These dolls, incorporating AI like Meta Platforms' Llama, offer five different personalities and improved user experience, leading to a reported 30% increase in sales. After a year of development, WMDoll delivered over 100 prototypes of the LLM-powered MetaBox series to Europe and North America-based customers.

articles.title: Astral Dynamic Networks Sets Stage For Viral Impact Through Strategic Partnerships and Acquisitions
articles.summary: Astradyne, Inc. is launching 'Project Smart,' a software solution designed to transform global connectivity and collaboration.  The company is establishing strategic partnerships to enhance its product offerings and market reach, aiming for viral impact and market penetration for its 1st Gen products.

articles.title: Dunelm's 'gorgeous' new bedding set 'doesn't need
articles.author: Beth Mahoney
articles.summary: Dunelm has launched the 'Billie Duvet Cover and Pillowcase Set', featuring luxurious pinsonic detailing and convenience. Debenhams is showcasing the 'Luxury Seersucker Duvet Cover Set Geo Pillowcase Quilt'. M&S offers the 'Egyptian Cotton 230 Thread Count Duvet Cover' in various colors.

articles.title: Kissflow helps companies digitalize without code
articles.author: CEDTy Clea
articles.summary: Kissflow, an Indian startup, provides low-code and no-code platforms enabling businesses to quickly develop applications. These platforms, utilizing AI-suggested fields, aim to reduce application development time from months to days or weeks. Kissflow is targeting the Philippines as a key market for expansion of its platform.

articles.title: UAE: Want to know where your food came from? New platform to list safety information
articles.author: Hind Aldah
articles.summary: DM (Dubai Municipality) is launching Montaji+, a digital platform to trace food sources and verify ethical sourcing, unveiled at Gulfood 2025. Montaji+ uses AI to streamline product registration by using a product image to automatically fill in required forms. Additionally, DM introduces 'Green Channel,' allowing companies with a clean record to bypass inspection and directly send products to market.

articles.title: Kanye West takes a savage swipe at one of Nike's new designs just as they announce new collab with his ex-wife Kim Kardashian's brand SKIMs
articles.author: Merry
articles.summary: Skims and Nike are collaborating to launch a new active clothing brand called Nikeskims. The brand, which has been in development since October 2023, will debut its first collection this spring, featuring women's training clothes, shoes, and accessories. The collaboration aims to combine Nike's sports performance expertise with Skims' focus on female form and inclusion.

articles.title: Shoppers are rushing to buy this 'powerful' steam mop
articles.author: Beth Mahoney
articles.summary: Swan has launched the 16-in-1 Steam Mop, featuring a detergent tank and priced at ¬£69.99, available at Swan and Amazon. The steam mop can be used on various surfaces and includes multiple attachments. Alternative steam mops from Polti and Shark are also mentioned.

articles.title: Celebrate Black History Month with these expert-approved beauty finds, from Oui The People, Maed Beauty and more
articles.author: Jillian Ortiz
articles.summary: Essence Magazine's VP Nandi Howard highlighted several Black-owned businesses, including Robin and Andr√©a's wine company and Brown Girl Jane, which makes fragrances and donates to women's health. Other products mentioned include Topicals' Slather Body Serum to improve skin texture, Bellamy's mattress slip for infant hair protection, and Elisa Johnson's aviator sunglasses.

articles.title: Grok, o3 and ELMo ‚Äî there's a reason AI names are so weird Grok„ÄÅo3ÂíåELMoÔºö‰∫∫Â∑•Êô∫ËÉΩÁöÑÂêçÂ≠ó‰∏∫‰ΩïÂ¶ÇÊ≠§Â•áÊÄ™Ôºü
articles.author: Ëã±ÂõΩ ÈáëËûçÊó∂Êä•
articles.summary: OpenAI launched its latest AI model, o3-mini, in late January. This new model aims to compete with lower-cost Chinese alternatives.

articles.title: How to use 'Subscribe & Save' on Amazon app
articles.summary: Amazon allows users to subscribe to products through its app using the 'Subscribe & Save' feature. Customers can select delivery frequency, address, and payment method to set up recurring orders with a discount.

articles.title: As DEI Rollbacks Hit The Beauty Industry, Which Brands Are Still Committed To Diversity?
articles.author: Sheilla Mamona
articles.summary: Rebundle introduced non-toxic, biodegradable braiding hair. The Original Unbraider launched an innovative hair comb that efficiently unravels multiple braids while detangling hair. Moodeaux received a pre-launch grant from Pull Up For Change Impact Fund for Black-owned businesses, amounting to $25,000, which allowed them to launch. Ulta Beauty partnered with Fifteen Percent Pledge on a program featuring a 10-week curriculum, including a brand strategy and positioning session and a $10,000 award for one of the brands ‚Äì MUSE Accelerator

articles.title: Save ¬£50 on cordless vacuum cleaner that promises to banish pet hair
articles.author: Kerri-Ann Roper
articles.summary: SMOTURE launched its Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, now available on Amazon for ¬£119.50, reduced from ¬£169.99. The vacuum features a 550W motor, 45KPA suction power, an hour of runtime, and a touch screen with four suction modes. Alternative cordless vacuum options from Dyson (v8) and Shark (Anti Hair Wrap Cordless Upright Vacuum) are also mentioned.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics Canada Customer Service Wins Bronze in 'Best Use of Omni Channel' at International CX Awards 2024
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Canada Customer Service received a Bronze Award at the International CX Awards for its innovative Omni-channel experiences. The company's Omni AI support system utilizes advanced artificial intelligence technology to provide customers with personalized and proactive assistance.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics Canada Customer Service Wins Bronze in 'Best Use of Omni Channel' at International CX Awards 2024
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Canada Customer Service has been recognized for its Omni AI support system. The system utilizes AI to empower customers with personalized and proactive assistance. This new service provides tailored solutions and enhances the overall customer experience through AI-integrated customer care, round-the-clock virtual visual support, remote support, and proactive services via SmartThings smart plugs and home appliance remote management.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics Canada Customer Service Wins Bronze in 'Best Use of Omni Channel' at International CX Awards 2024
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Canada Customer Service has been recognized for its Omni AI support system, which leverages AI to provide personalized and proactive assistance. The company is also enhancing its services with SmartThings smart plugs and remote home appliance management to offer seamless omni-channel support.

articles.title: Best fully automatic washing machines in 2025: Top 10 picks from brands like LG, Samsung, and more
articles.author: Bharat Sharma
articles.summary: LG, Samsung, Bosch, Whirlpool, and IFB introduced fully automatic washing machines with innovative features in 2025. These models include smart technology, steam cleaning, and energy-efficient motors. Customer reviews highlight quiet operation, effective cleaning, and ease of use for these new washing machines.

articles.title: Leviton Launches Immersive Customer Experience Center in Nashville
articles.author: Leviton
articles.summary: Leviton has launched its new "Leviton LIVE" customer experience center in Nashville, Tennessee. This center offers hands-on training and integrated electrical and network infrastructure solution demos tailored to customer projects in both residential and commercial settings. The launch reflects Leviton's commitment to growth in healthcare and data center markets.

articles.title: Tenable Strengthens Its Identity Exposure Capabilities to Protect Against Compromises
articles.summary: Tenable has launched Identity 360 and Exposure Center, new capabilities within Tenable Identity Exposure. These aim to provide organizations with 360-degree visibility into identity risk and enable targeted action to prevent identity-based attacks by unifying visibility across identity providers. The company's AI-powered exposure management platform radically unifies security visibility, insight and action across the attack surface.

articles.title: Tenable Strengthens Its Identity Exposure Capabilities to Protect Against Compromises
articles.author: Tenable Holdings
articles.summary: Tenable launched Identity 360 and Exposure Center on February 18, 2025. These new capabilities are designed to help organizations pinpoint identity risks and prevent identity-based attacks. They simplify identity management complexity by delivering unified visibility across identity providers.

articles.title: Dawn¬Æ Launches its Best Liquid Dish Soap with Double the Suds
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Dawn, the #1 dish liquid brand, launched Dawn PowerSuds, a new liquid dish soap designed for efficiently washing dishes. The product features a proprietary formula that delivers double the suds, effectively trapping grease and eliminating residue transfer across dishes.

articles.title: ‚ÄòIt's so annoying' WhatsApp users fume as ‚Äòstupid' new feature rolls out ‚Äì but there's ...
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: Meta is rolling out Meta AI, an AI chatbot, to WhatsApp users. This AI feature aims to answer questions and provide customer support within the chat application.

articles.title: Insight Flex for Devices Brings Automated Simplicity to Enterprise Device Management
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Insight Enterprises launched the enhanced Insight Flex for Devices (Flex) program. Flex is a Device-as-a-Service (DaaS) solution intended to improve employee experience through device management. The program offers automation, proactive communications, e-commerce, and intelligent data for increased visibility.

articles.title: The New Release of Mender by Northern.tech Streamlines Complex Over-the-Air (OTA) Updates With Service Provider Functionality
articles.author: Northern.tech
articles.summary: Northern.tech released a new version of Mender, introducing Service Provider functionality. This feature enhances security and management for isolated tenants in diverse environments. It streamlines over-the-air (OTA) update management across complex environments.

articles.title: My Skin Has Been Dewy and Hydrated All Winter Thanks to This Peptide Cream
articles.author: Savannah Born
articles.summary: A nourishing skin cream with a patented triple lipid blend restores the skin's ceramides and fatty acids while peptides firm the skin, minimize lines and redness, support the skin barrier and soothe. 97% of users noticed immediate improvements in hydration as well as smoother, softer skin in one week with consistent use. This pH-balanced cream aims to make the skin look and feel younger, more radiant, and more nourished.

articles.title: Heinz is making huge change to baked beans for first time in 150 years
articles.author: Alice Giddings
articles.summary: Heinz is launching a competition, "Beanz of Your Dreamz", inviting the public to create and suggest new baked beans flavors for the company. The top three flavor ideas will be produced, and the winners will receive ¬£5,000 and a lifetime supply of Heinz baked beans. The competition runs for a month, starting February 18, via the "beanzofyourdreamz" website.

articles.title: Zomato Launches Nugget: AI-Powered No-Code Customer Support Platform For Businesses- Here's How It Works
articles.summary: Eternal Ltd, Zomato's parent company, has launched Nugget AI, a no-code AI customer support platform designed to provide affordable and customizable customer service solutions for businesses. Nugget AI, previously used internally by Zomato, Blinkit, and Hyperpure, autonomously resolves up to 80% of customer queries and reduces resolution times by 20%.

articles.title: Huawei Mate XT launched globally, but will it come to India?
articles.summary: Huawei launched the Mate XT, a tri-fold phone, globally after its initial launch in China. The Mate XT unfolds twice into a 10.2-inch screen and features a 50MP primary camera and a 5,600mAh battery with fast charging.

articles.title: Sauce Essentials Expands Live Resin Line With New 1.25g AIO Vape Launch in California
articles.summary: Sauce Essentials is launching upgraded 1.25g Live Resin All-In-One (AIO) Sauce Bars vape line in Sour Blue Dream and Black Truffle flavors. The new line will replace their 1g live resin AIO vape products, enhancing Sauce Essentials' product lineup with a larger format and a commitment to high-quality live resin extraction, initially available in California from February 2025 and expanding to other markets in the coming months.

articles.title: MWC 2025: New Amdocs Generative AI Suite, amAIz, Brings Together Disparate Data, Advanced Insights and GenAI Capabilities to Simplify and Accelerate Generative AI Adoption
articles.author: Michael Zema
articles.summary: Amdocs launched amAIz Suite, a modular offering designed to break down data silos and predict customer needs using Generative AI. The suite combines AI, data analytics, and a GenAI platform, including features like the Amdocs AI & Data Platform (AIDP) and Customer Experience Insights (CXI), aiming to enhance customer experiences and operational efficiency. It also includes amAIz Agents to drive revenue growth and streamline operations.

articles.title: MWC 2025: New Amdocs Generative AI Suite, amAIz, Brings Together Disparate Data, Advanced Insights and GenAI Capabilities to Simplify and Accelerate Generative AI Adoption
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: Amdocs launched amAIz Suite, a modular offering designed to predict customer needs, break down data silos, and leverage Generative AI for communication service providers. This suite aims to improve customer experience, create revenue opportunities, and increase efficiency.

articles.title: 5 Things to Know About Zomato's Nugget AI
articles.author: Entrepreneur Staff
articles.summary: Zomato has launched Nugget, an AI-powered customer support platform, expanding its services to B2B software. Nugget is designed to autonomously resolve customer queries, reduce response times, and integrate with business tools like WhatsApp and Salesforce. To encourage adoption, Zomato is offering Nugget for free to companies locked into contracts with legacy support providers.

articles.title: The State of the Status Hand Soap
articles.author: Bella Druckman
articles.summary: Loewe's Tomato Leaves hand soap, released in 2021, has gained popularity and is now found in restaurants and homes.  Perfumer H launched its own hand soap last September featuring citrus and cedar notes, also offering options with handblown glass bottles. In May 2024, Equinox replaced Kiehl's with Grown Alchemist soaps in their locker rooms.

articles.title: DJI's Osmo Mobile 7P gimbal can track you around on any Android or iOS camera app
articles.author: Steve Dent
articles.summary: DJI has launched two new smartphone gimbals: the Osmo Mobile 7 and 7P. The Osmo Mobile 7P features a Multifunctional Module enabling native app tracking on both Android and iOS. The Osmo Mobile 7 is priced at $89, and the Osmo Mobile 7P is available for $149, with shipping starting today.

articles.title: DJI's new Osmo Mobile 7 Pro has so very many tricks up its sleeve
articles.author: Sean Hollister
articles.summary: DJI launched the Osmo Mobile 7 Pro for $149 and the Osmo Mobile 7 for $89. The Osmo Mobile 7 Pro features a new 'Multifunctional Module' with computer vision, a built-in fill light, and wireless microphone receiver. Both gimbals started shipping from DJI's website today.

articles.title: What is Grok 3? Elon Musk's xAI unveils 'scary smart' AI chatbot to challenge OpenAI, DeepSeek: 10-point explainer
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: xAI launched its new AI chatbot, Grok 3, on February 17, 2025, showcasing capabilities like advanced reasoning and text-to-video conversion. Grok 3 outperforms other AI models like Google's Gemini 2 Pro and OpenAI's GPT-4o in science, coding, and math. X premium+ users have access to Grok-3, and a separate subscription called Super Grok will provide earliest access to new features.

articles.title: GoDaddy Airo¬Æ: An AI-Powered Revolutionary Solution for Pakistani Entrepreneurs and Small Business Owners
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: GoDaddy launched GoDaddy Airo¬Æ, a new AI-powered experience, designed for small and medium-sized businesses. GoDaddy Airo¬Æ provides accessible AI-powered tools that enables entrepreneurs to establish a comprehensive online presence within minutes, bridging the gap between vision and digital reality. It includes features like instant brand creation, digital marketing tools, and Search Engine Optimization.

articles.title: Aldi Ireland¬†fans rushing to buy new laundry storage staples in middle aisle ‚Äì and it costs just ‚Ç¨4.99
articles.author: Emma Mooney
articles.summary: ALDI Ireland introduced a new Laundry Storage Solution for ‚Ç¨4.99, featuring stacking, narrow, and turntable options. They also launched a Walk-in Greenhouse for ‚Ç¨55, designed with shelves and a zip-closure door. Additionally, Aldi is featuring over 47 new products from 27 Irish suppliers through their 'Grow with Aldi' program.

articles.title: Amazon's 'life-changing' mattress topper is now on sale
articles.author: Phoebe Barton Lifestyle
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the MightySoft Mattress Topper, available in multiple sizes with discounts, starting from ¬£29.99. Debenhams has the Ezysleep 4 Inch Thick Super Soft Mattress Topper on sale, with the double size priced at ¬£40.79. Dunelm is selling a Hotel Luxury Cotton Mattress Topper, with prices ranging from ¬£28 to ¬£42.

articles.title: Amazon's 'life-changing' mattress topper that's 'like sleeping on a cloud' is now on sale
articles.author: Phoebe Barton
articles.summary: Amazon is selling the MightySoft Mattress Topper, with prices starting at ¬£29.99. The double size is discounted to ¬£33.99. Debenhams offers the Ezysleep 4 Inch Thick Super Soft Mattress Topper, with the double size on sale for ¬£40.79.

articles.title: With a capacity of 15 kg: The giant brand that launched a monster washing machine
articles.summary: Haier is launching a new, large-capacity (up to 15kg) washing machine in Israel to address the increasing demand for efficient laundry solutions for larger families. The new machine features advanced washing technologies, a user-friendly interface, a stainless-steel drum with internal lighting, and 14 built-in programs, including steam and refresh functions.

articles.title: After delivering over 10,000 Door Dash orders, Clarenville man launches own service
articles.author: Christopher Ballard
articles.summary: Steve Bailey launched Bailey's Delivery, a food delivery service in Clarenville, offering deliveries from any local restaurant for a fee. He aims to provide a cheaper alternative to DoorDash and cater to restaurants not currently offering delivery services, expanding his service area beyond food to include other items in the future.

articles.title: ULTIMATE DESIGN Launches Worldwide, Pioneers a New Chapter in Foldable Technology
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Huawei has launched the HUAWEI Mate XT | ULTIMATE DESIGN, the world's first commercial tri-fold smartphone, featuring a 10.2-inch foldable display and a thickness of 3.6mm when unfolded. The smartphone boasts an Advanced Precision Hinge System, a Trifold Display, and HUAWEI XMAGE imaging capabilities with a 10-size adjustable physical aperture.

articles.title: Amazon vacuum 'very comparable to Dyson' is only ¬£120 in sale
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg What's On
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the SMOTURE Cordless Vacuum Cleaner for ¬£119.50, reduced from ¬£169.99. The SMOTURE vacuum cleaner features a 550W brushless motor and provides up to one hour of runtime per charge and it is compared to vacuums from brands like Dyson and Shark.

articles.title: Zong 4G unveils Pakistan's first AI-Generated television campaign
articles.summary: Zong 4G has launched an AI-generated television campaign for the ICC Champions Trophy. Additionally, My Zong App users can now enjoy seamless, high-quality ICC match streaming with exclusive cricket bundles ensuring fans stay connected.

articles.title: I'm the Queen of Clean and you need to nab this ¬£3 buy from M&S ...
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: Lynsey Crombie highlights the return of a favorite fabric refresher spray at M&S (Marks and Spencer). This product aims to eliminate musky smells on laundry.

articles.title: Kylie Jenner favouring a natural beauty look
articles.author: Bang Showbiz
articles.summary: Kylie Cosmetics has launched The Natural Blur Powder Foundation, a vegan product designed for versatile coverage. This new product joins Kylie Cosmetics' line of complexion products, including Skin Tint Blurring Elixir and Power Plush Longwear Concealer and Foundation, designed to blend seamlessly for a natural look or full coverage.

articles.title: Elon Musk's Grok AI 3 Model Finally Announced: Is It Better Than ChatGPT 4?
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: xAI has launched its new Grok 3 AI model, boasting superior performance compared to GPT 4o in analytical and scientific problem-solving. Grok 3 features a reasoning model and self-correction capabilities. Access is currently limited to X Premium+ subscribers, with a new SuperGrok plan costing $30 per month offering enhanced features.

articles.title: I'm the Queen of Clean and you need to nab this ¬£3 buy from M&S ‚Äì your clothes will smell fresh for so much longer
articles.author: Senior Digital Writer
articles.summary: M&S has launched the French Lavender & Peony Fabric Freshener Spray, available on Ocado for ¬£3. This plant-based, biodegradable fabric refresher is suitable for clothes, furniture, and as a room spray. Customers praise its fresh, long-lasting scent and value, with many preferring it to Febreze.

articles.title: I'm the Queen of Clean and you need to nab this ¬£3 buy from M&S ‚Äì your clothes will smell fresh for so much longer
articles.author: Abigail Wilson
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer (M&S) relaunched its fabric refresher spray, available in French Lavender and Peony scent. The plant-based spray is suitable for use on clothes, furniture, and as a room spray. Customers praise its long-lasting scent and affordability.

articles.title: I'm the Queen of Clean and you need to nab this ¬£3 buy from M&S ‚Äì your clothes will smell fresh for so much longer
articles.author: Abigail Wilson
articles.summary: M&S has brought back its French Lavender & Peony Fabric Freshener Spray, priced at ¬£3, which is available at Ocado. The plant-based spray is designed to freshen clothes, furniture, and rooms with a spa-like scent, and contains botanical essential oils safe for use around pets.  Shoppers have praised the product as a long-lasting, cost-effective alternative to Febreze.

articles.title: ULTIMATE DESIGN Launches Worldwide, Pioneers a New Chapter in Foldable Technology
articles.author: Huawei
articles.summary: Huawei announced the global release of HUAWEI Mate XT | ULTIMATE DESIGN, described as the world's first commercial tri-fold smartphone. This launch signifies Huawei's continued innovation in foldable technology.

articles.title: Lidl making big change to how it sells online this week with brand new launch
articles.author: Flanagan
articles.summary: Lidl is launching a TikTok shop, becoming the first supermarket to sell directly on the platform. They are offering a limited-edition bundle of nine high-protein products, typically valued at ¬£30, for just ¬£5. Additionally, Lidl is offering loyalty scheme members a 25% discount on chilled high-protein products in-store.

articles.title: Huawei Unfold the New Innovative Chapter with Global Release of Tri-fold Smartphone, Next-Gen Tablets and Open-Ear Audio
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Huawei Consumer Business Group (CBG) unveiled new audio, wearable, tablets, and foldable products. The launch event, HUAWEI Innovative Product Launch, was held in Kuala Lumpur.

articles.title: Huawei Unfold the New Innovative Chapter with Global Release of Tri-fold Smartphone, Next-Gen Tablets and Open-Ear Audio
articles.author: Huawei
articles.summary: Huawei Consumer Business Group launched a range of products including audio devices, wearables, tablets, and foldable smartphones at an event in Kuala Lumpur. The event featured the unveiling of the HUAWEI Mate XT | ULTIMATE DESIGN, a commercial tri-fold smartphone.

articles.title: Best selling plunger that 'you need' in your toilet for emergencies is just ¬£13
articles.author: Kerri-Ann Roper
articles.summary: Luigi's Toilet Plunger, available on Amazon for ¬£12.96 (discounted from ¬£15.49), uses a unique design to push water and clear blockages, working on various toilet types. The plunger is highly rated by customers for its effectiveness and ease of use, offering eight times the force of a regular cup plunger.

articles.title: Yan Cosmetics London
articles.author: Howard Campbell Nbsp
articles.summary: Yan Cosmetics London hosted a pop-up event in Essex, England, from February 8-14 to allow customers to experience the quality of their beauty products. The brand also announced the availability of its products at Shop Indiana's in St Elizabeth, Jamaica. A special Valentine's Sip and Shop event was held to express gratitude to the Jamaican community.

articles.title: Huawei's tri-foldable phone hits global markets in a show of defiance amid US curbs
articles.author: Eileen Ng
articles.summary: Huawei globally launched the Mate XT, its first tri-foldable phone priced at 3,499 euros, featuring a 10.2-inch screen. Additionally, Huawei unveiled the MatePad Pro tablet and Free Arc open-ear earbuds at the Kuala Lumpur event. The company aims to innovate despite U.S. technology curbs.

articles.title: Huawei's tri-foldable phone hits global markets in a show of defiance amid US curbs
articles.author: EILEEN NG
articles.summary: Huawei launched the Mate X5, the industry's first tri-foldable phone, at a global event in Kuala Lumpur. Priced at 3,499 euros ($3,662), the Mate X5 has three mini-panels and folds twice, featuring a 10.2-inch screen.

articles.title: Huawei's tri-foldable phone hits global markets in a show of defiance amid US curbs
articles.author: EILEEN NG
articles.summary: Huawei launched the industry's first tri-foldable phone at a global event. Analysts view this as a symbolic win for Huawei despite ongoing U.S. technology restrictions.

articles.title: No-Code, AI-Powered, Cost-Effective: Zomato Launches AI Platform Nugget
articles.author: NDTV News Desk
articles.summary: Zomato introduced Nugget, an AI-powered customer support platform designed to automate and manage customer interactions without coding, resolving up to 80% of queries autonomously. After handling over 15 million support interactions per month for Zomato, Blinkit, and Hyperpure internally, Zomato is now offering Nugget to businesses worldwide, positioning it as a cost-effective alternative to legacy customer support providers, even providing it for free to founders stuck in legacy contracts.

articles.title: DTDC launches DIVA 2.0, AI-powered virtual assistant for customer support
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: DTDC Express has launched a new technological tool on its MyDTDC mobile app and website.

articles.title: Zomato launches AI customer support platform Nugget for businesses
articles.author: The Hindu Bureau
articles.summary: Zomato has launched Nugget, an AI-powered customer support platform designed to automate business operations. This no-code platform can resolve up to 80% of queries autonomously and is already handling 15 million interactions monthly across Zomato, Blinkit, and Hyperpure. Nugget has decreased resolution times by 20% and is the first product from Zomato Labs.

articles.title: Imperial Black ‚Äì Celebrate the Vibe of Naija With a Bold New Blend

This new offering aims to provide a unique and premium experience for quality-seeking Nigerian consumers, redefining moments of celebration.

articles.title: du becomes the first telecom operator in the UAE to launch 5G Voice over New Radio (VoNR)
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: du, a telecom and digital services provider, launched the 5G Voice over New Radio (VoNR) service in the UAE. This makes du the first telecom operator in the UAE to commercially launch the service.

articles.title: Huawei launches tri-folding Mate XT Ultimate Design smartphone in Malaysia, pre-orders priced at RM14,999
articles.author: Christopher Fam
articles.summary: Huawei has launched the Mate XT Ultimate Design smartphone featuring a tri-folding OLED display, the Huawei MatePad Pro tablet with a 13.2in OLED screen, and the Huawei Band 10 fitness watch. The Malaysian version of the Mate XT Ultimate Design will come with 16GB RAM and 1TB internal storage priced at RM14,999. The Huawei MatePad Pro tablet is priced at RM4,999, while the Huawei Band 10 fitness watch is priced at RM199.

articles.title: After The New Tesla Model Y Comes The Affordable ‚ÄòModel Q'‚Äì More Vehicles In The ...
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Tesla is planning a major product rollout in 2025, including a more affordable Tesla model. The company may also introduce more new vehicles in the future.

articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Toyota is developing the Innova BEV Concept. The concept's design is similar to the Innova Crysta.

articles.title: Huawei Mate XT trifold launches outside of China: Price, specs
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Huawei launched the Mate XT, its innovative trifold smartphone, globally. The Mate XT features two folding points, allowing users to display content on a single, double, or triple screen and is priced at ‚Ç¨3,499, targeting high-end consumers seeking unique technology.

articles.title: Zomato Labs Introduces Nugget, An AI-Driven 'Low Cost' Customer Support Platform For Businesses

articles.summary: Zomato Labs introduced Nugget, an AI-native, no-code customer support platform, designed for businesses. This platform resolves up to 80% of queries autonomously and is currently powering support interactions for Zomato, Blinkit, and Hyperpure; Zomato is now offering it to businesses worldwide.

articles.title: Megan Thee Stallion unveils new tequila label for the 'hotties' as part of her 30th birthday celebrations
articles.author: Daily Mail
articles.summary: Megan Thee Stallion launched Chicas Divertidas tequila. The launch coincided with her birthday.

articles.title: Guinness Smooth launches new look bottle & new brand campaign
articles.author: Makena Ndung'u
articles.summary: Guinness Smooth has launched a new brand identity featuring a redesigned bottle, accompanied by the 'Make It Yours' campaign. This campaign encourages creativity and community collaboration, launching with commercials showcasing fashion collectives from East and West Africa. The updated Guinness Smooth is available across Kenya.

articles.title: Are South African smartphone consumers turning to AI as smartphone sales increase globally?
articles.author: Partnered Content
articles.summary: HONOR has launched the HONOR X9c smartphone in South Africa, targeting the mid-tier segment. The device features AI-driven enhancements for photography, battery performance, and user experience, reflecting the growing demand for AI-powered devices. HONOR's business grew by 180% by the end of 2024, selling 1 million units.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Review: A compact and powerful choice with AI toppings
articles.author: Haider Ali Khan
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25, powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, featuring AI enhancements and running on Android 15 with One UI 7. The phone includes a refined design, an upgraded camera system with AI-enhanced processing, and improvements to the display, with a price starting at ‚Çπ80,999.

articles.title: Elon Musk's company launches 'scary smart' AI chatbot
articles.author: AFP
articles.summary: Elon Musk's xAI launched Grok 3, the latest version of its AI chatbot, boasting improved reasoning capabilities and aiming to outperform existing models like ChatGPT. Grok 3, trained on synthetic data and employing self-correction mechanisms, will initially be available to Premium+ subscribers of X. The chatbot is going up against OpenAI's ChatGPT and DeepSeek's R1.

articles.title: What is Grok 3, which Elon Musk claims is the ‚Äòsmartest AI on Earth'?

articles.summary: xAI has unveiled a new chatbot. The chatbot outperforms existing generative AI.

articles.title: Inception, MBZUAI launch SHERKALA transforming LLM landscape for Kazakhstan
articles.author: Tahawultech
articles.summary: MBZUAI, in collaboration, introduced a new AI model designed for Kazakh speakers. This model aims to redefine the LLM landscape by providing scalable, efficient, and inclusive AI solutions.

articles.title: ‚ö°Know Price, Specifications and Features About BYD Sealion 7 Launched in India
articles.summary: BYD Auto launched its new electric vehicle, the BYD Sealion 7, in India. The vehicle is available in Premium and Performance variants and includes details regarding its price, specifications, and features.

articles.title: Zomato unveils Nugget: AI-powered chatbot for autonomous customer support
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Eternal, the parent company of Zomato, has launched Nugget, an AI-native, no-code customer support platform. Nugget is designed as a low-cost, customizable solution that automates customer support and resolves up to 80% of queries autonomously. The platform has already powered over 15 million customer interactions on Zomato, Blinkit, and Hyperpure and is now available to businesses worldwide.

articles.title: Although the use of artificial intelligence (AI) has become more common in everyday life, consumers'..

articles.summary: Data startup R2C Company launched the Pickply platform app service in 2022. The surveyed net customer recommendation index showed negative points for several generative AI services: ChatGPT, Gemini, Luton, Hyperclova X, and DeepSeek.

articles.title: Gupshup Launches AI Agent Library
articles.summary: Gupshup has launched the AI Agent Library, a suite of 15 customizable AI agents designed for B2C engagement. Built on the Gupshup Conversation Cloud, these AI agents are capable of handling various tasks, including lead generation, product discovery, and order management across multiple channels. Businesses can customize and deploy these agents while maintaining security and control.

articles.title: Amazon reduces ¬£45 'game changer' device for cleaning dogs after muddy walks
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Mud Daddy, a portable cleaning device, at a reduced price of ¬£44.99. The Mud Daddy features a five-litre capacity, a pump handle for water flow, and a sprayer brush, making it suitable for cleaning dogs, boots, and equipment after outdoor activities.

articles.title: Transformative Impact of WhatsApp Automation on Indian Businesses
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Vyapar Automation is promoting the use of WhatsApp Business API solutions. Brands such as Wheel Crafts, Shonas Style, and AayushBharat IN are using the technology to provide product recommendations and automate order processes. This shift facilitates conversational commerce via digital transformation.

articles.title: Musk launches 'scary smart' AI chatbot
articles.author: Lionel Bonaventure
articles.summary: Elon Musk's AI company is releasing a new version of its chatbot, Grok. The updated chatbot is an AI product from the company.

articles.title: The rise of agentic AI and the future of human work
articles.author: Hein Kaiser
articles.summary: Absa plans to use agentic AI to improve business processes, potentially enhancing credit scoring, fraud detection, and customer sentiment analysis for better service delivery. MultiChoice is exploring artificial intelligence to personalize viewer engagement and streamline content production. Both companies are also focusing on upskilling employees to effectively manage and leverage these new AI technologies.

articles.title: Future Scent: How Brands are Leveraging Scent Marketing & what the Future Holds?
articles.author: Deepti Verma
articles.summary: Nike conducted a study revealing that scented environments led to an 84% increase in buying intent. Retail stores like Abercrombie & Fitch use scent marketing, while stores and shopping malls are investing in ambient scenting to enhance customer experiences. Hotel chains use signature scents, and automotive brands use fragrances to create unique experiences.

articles.title: Cricket Debut S2 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Cricket officially announced the Cricket Debut S2 smartphone in Q4 2023. The budget smartphone features a 6.1-inch display, MediaTek Helio A22 processor, 3GB RAM, 32GB internal storage, and an 8-megapixel rear camera along with a 5-megapixel front camera, fueled by a 3000 mAh battery. It is available in Deep Navy and offered at a competitive price.

articles.title: Nubia's Z70 Ultra review: a photography powerhouse

This limited-time promotion, featuring items like protein peanut butter, pancake mix, and protein powder, is available on a first-come, first-served basis via the @LidlGB TikTok account with proceeds benefiting the NSPCC.

articles.summary: Genpact has launched a new service called 'Service as Agentic Solutions'. This new service is part of the shift towards Agentic AI, which represents a redefinition of how businesses allocate resources by employing agents capable of handling complex tasks.
